values: Friends.Only add me, and i'll most likely add you back. x. you speak in ebonics. x. you TyPe LyK DiS. x. you're a gossip queen. x. you beg for comments. x. you wreak of discrimination. x. we have absolutely nothing in common. x. your grammar is horrid and painful. if any of those are the case, don't bother please. also, i don't condone drama in any shape or form. if you're known for causing it, get out. cheers!
